name: Valid Login
description: User logs in with correct credentials

name: Invalid Email
description: User attempts login with non-existent email

name: Invalid Password
description: User enters correct email but wrong password

name: Empty Email
description: User attempts login with empty email field

name: Empty Password
description: User attempts login with empty password field

name: Both Empty
description: User attempts login with both fields empty

name: SQL Injection
description: User attempts SQL injection in email field

name: Remember Me
description: User logs in and checks remember me checkbox
